SELECT
c.Nemonico as c_Nemonico, c.nombre as c_nombre, c.creditos as c_creditos, c.horas_monitoria as c_horas_monitoria,
t.Identificador as t_Identificador, t.nombre as t_nombre, t.descripcion as t_descripcion
FROM Curso as c left join Tema as t ON c.Nemonico=t.curso_nemonico
WHERE c.Nemonico = #{neCurso}

SELECT
c.Nemonico as c_Nemonico, c.nombre as c_nombre, c.creditos as c_creditos, c.horas_monitoria as c_horas_monitoria,
t.Identificador as t_Identificador, t.nombre as t_nombre, t.descripcion as t_descripcion,
g.Identificador as g_Identificador, g.numero as g_numero,
p.Codigo as p_Codigo, p.nombre as p_nombre, p.apellido as p_apellido, p.celular as p_celular, p.correo as p_correo, p.clave as p_clave
FROM Curso as c left join Grupo as g ON c.Nemonico = g.curso_nemonico left join Profesor as p ON g.profesor_codigo = p.Codigo left join Tema as t ON c.Nemonico=t.curso_nemonico
WHERE p.Codigo = #{coProfesor}
